entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the Atlantic coast late in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
